name: Epic Movement
description: To provide an environment in which students may join and interact in a community of fellow, like-minded students who have their hearts set on the Bible.  We will also provide a learning and social environment for students through weekly Bible studies, large groups activities, and leadership opportunities, all focused on the educating the members in the Christian faith.  While our focus is on Asian-American students, anyone is encouraged to participate in our activities and/or join, especially those who have an interest in this culture.
